title: Không thể nói (Hoa thiên cốt OST)
lyrics: Yong ni de shou jie wo de suo Die ru zhe wen rou xuan wo Qian zhang feng bo wan ban cua tuo Qing yi dou bu ceng bian guo Yi shi qian ban yi nian cheng huo Hai zhi yi yi cuo zai cuo Yi shun zhi jian yi sheng si shou Fen sui cheng mo Ai shang nia ai shang le cuo Shi le ni shi le hun po Ke xiao ming yun zhuo nong Lai shi jin sheng wu chu tao tao Bu shi bu ke shuo, shi wo bu gan shuo Yi bu yi wei xiao yi bu yi shang xin yi bu yi jie nan hua zuo fei e pu huo Yin wei ai shang ni wo bian mei liao wo Rang yi qie dou sui feng san tuo Bu shi bu ke shuo, shi wo bu gan shuo Xiang yong zhe cheng nuo Bie guai wo nuo ruo qing bu rong ni wo She wo hu ni er huo Yin wei ai shang ni , wo cai cheng le wo. Gong ni chen mo
